title: Deploy Fly.io app with metrics endpoint
description: Deployed app to https://nthlayer-demo.fly.dev with /metrics endpoint. Status: COMPLETE

title: Configure Grafana Cloud to scrape Fly.io metrics
description: Need to add scrape job in Grafana Cloud to pull metrics from https://nthlayer-demo.fly.dev/metrics. Metrics endpoint verified working.

title: Import NthLayer dashboard to Grafana Cloud
description: Run 'nthlayer apply examples/services/payment-api.yaml' and import generated dashboard to Grafana Cloud. Make dashboard public.

title: Enable GitHub Pages for demo site
description: Go to repo Settings → Pages → Source: /docs directory. Wait for deployment.
